headline: GTA Online
subtitle: Discounts
content:
If all that talk about fumes up there got you excited, youâ€™ll be pleased to know that there are plenty of ways to save on all things Arena War this week. Enjoy discounts on Arena Workshops and Upgrades as well as a selection of high-performance vehicles.

- Arena Workshop, Upgrades & Modifications - 40% Off
- Arena HVY Scarab -30% Off
- Declasse Tulip - 40% Off
- Schyster Deviant - 40% Off

And more! Check out the Rockstar Newswire for more details.
